betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6Enrichment Chamber§r allows you to do various of things; this includes: making §ecompressed materials§r, §eore processing§r, converting §edirty dust into it's normal form§r, etc.

This machine is particularly used in ore processing line, being able to §aclean the dust and double the profit when inputted with ores§r. The Enrichment Chamber also has a §afactory variant§r, so you'll be able to enrich items much faster in the context of mass production.

To craft one, you'll need four §6Redstone Dust§r, two §6Iron Ingot§rs, two §6Basic Control Circuit§rs, and a §6Steel Casing§r.
